title: Typophile | Typographic Collaboration
content:
## [TypeCon2008 Buffalo Town Hall Meeting, Tues., Nov. 6](http://web.archive.org/web/20071105030005/http:/typophile.com/node/38610 "TypeCon2008 Buffalo Town Hall Meeting, Tues., Nov. 6")

Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20071105030005/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 30.Oct.2007 7.55am 

SOTAâ€™s going back to Buffalo next week to meet with local crew and others interested in helping to develop the TypeCon2008 program and extracurricular activities.

Tuesday, November 6, 2007  
6:30pm - 9:00pm  
Old Editions Book Shop & Cafe  
74 East Huron Street  
Buffalo, NY

[Directions to TypeCon2008 Planning Meeting](http://web.archive.org/web/20071105030005/http:/maps.google.com/maps?f=q&hl=en&q=74+East+Huron+Street%2C+Buffalo%2C+NY)

All type lovers are encouraged to join us for this fun and informative brainstorming meeting. Coffee and dessert will be served to help fuel your creative juices.

Anyone interested is welcome to attend, but please RSVP so we know how much caffeine and sugar to have on hand.  
Email: richard at p22.com and info at typesociety.org

 [Read more](http://web.archive.org/web/20071105030005/http:/typophile.com/node/38610)
author: Miss Tiffany
